DOC.brief_summary: To assess the effect of CP-778,875 on HDL-C cholesterol in adult subjects with dyslipidemia and type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Effect of CP-778,875 on HDL-C in Subjects With Abnormal Lipid Levels and Type 2 Diabetes.
DOC.criteria: HDLC < or = 45 mg/dL for men and < or = 55 mg/dL for women Triglycerides between 150500 mg/dL Fasting Plasma Glucose 140240 mg/dL Known cardiovascular, carotid, or peripheral vascular disease
